VolumeType.description: Classification of volume types for UX and auto-tracking decisions

oneOf.description: Primary system drive containing OS and user data Examples: C:\ on Windows, / on Linux, Macintosh HD on macOS
Dedicated user data volumes (separate from OS) Examples: /System/Volumes/Data on macOS, separate /home on Linux
External or removable storage devices Examples: USB drives, external HDDs, /Volumes/* on macOS
Secondary internal storage (additional drives/partitions) Examples: D:, E: drives on Windows, additional mounted drives
System/OS internal volumes (hidden from normal view) Examples: /System/Volumes/* on macOS, Recovery partitions
Network attached storage Examples: SMB mounts, NFS, cloud storage

SdPath.description:
A path within the Spacedrive Virtual Distributed File System

This is the core abstraction that enables cross-device operations. An SdPath can represent: - A physical file at a specific path on a specific device - A content-addressed file that can be sourced from any device

This enum-based approach enables resilient file operations by allowing content-based paths to be resolved to optimal physical locations at runtime.

oneOf.description: A direct pointer to a file at a specific path on a specific device

device_id.description: The device where this file exists

path.description: The local path on that device

oneOf.description: An abstract, location-independent handle that refers to file content

GenericProgress.description: Generic progress information that all job types can convert into

metadata.description: Extended metadata specific to job type

percentage.description: Current progress as a percentage (0.0 to 1.0)

GenericProgress.title: GenericProgress

oneOf.description: Job is waiting to be executed
Job completed successfully with no specific output
Job is waiting to be executed

LocationAddOutput.description: Output from location add action dispatch
LocationAddOutput.title: LocationAddOutput

MountType.description: Represents how the volume is mounted in the system
MountType.title: MountType

PathMapping.description: Path mapping for resolving virtual paths to actual storage locations
PathMapping.title: PathMapping

metadata.description: Extended metadata specific to job type
